00001 /*
00002         Drawing related static class.
00003         This provides access to the game's Surfaces, color value conversion
00004         and text aligning helpers.
00005 */
00006 
00007 #ifndef DRAWING_H
00008 #define DRAWING_H
00009 
00010 #include <GeneralDefinitions.h>
00011 #include <Surface.h>
00012 
00013 class Drawing
00014 {
00015 public:
00016         //Retrieve Surfaces
00017         #define DECL_GET_SURFACE(name,address)\
00018         static DSurface* GetSurface_ ## name ()\
00019                 { DSurface* pSurf; MEM_READ32(pSurf,address); return pSurf; }
00020         
00021         static DSurface *&DSurface_Tile;
00022         static DSurface *&DSurface_Sidebar;
00023         static DSurface *&DSurface_Primary;
00024         static DSurface *&DSurface_Hidden;
00025         static DSurface *&DSurface_Alternate;
00026         static DSurface *&DSurface_Hidden_2;

00029         //TextBox dimensions for tooltip-style boxes
00030         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, int nX, int nY, int nMargin)
00031                 {
00032                         RectangleStruct box;
00033                         RectangleStruct* p_box=&box;
00034 
00035                         int ymarg=nMargin+2;
00036                         PUSH_IMM(nMargin);              //X Margin
00037                         PUSH_IMM(ymarg);                //Y Margin - should add 2, because X margin adds to 2 internally!
00038                         PUSH_IMM(0);                    //X Offset
00039                         PUSH_VAR32(nY);
00040                         PUSH_VAR32(nX);
00041                         SET_REG32(edx,pText);
00042                         SET_REG32(ecx,p_box);
00043                         CALL(0x4A59E0);
00044 
00045                         return box;
00046                 }
00047 
00048         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, int nX, int nY)
00049                 { return GetTextBox(pText, nX, nY, 2); }
00050 
00051         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, Point2D* pPoint)
00052                 { return GetTextBox(pText, pPoint->X, pPoint->Y, 2); }
00053 
00054         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, Point2D* pPoint, int nMargin)
00055                 { return GetTextBox(pText, pPoint->X, pPoint->Y, nMargin); }
00056 
00057         //TextDimensions for text aligning
00058         static RectangleStruct GetTextDimensions(const wchar_t* pText)
00059                 {
00060                         RectangleStruct dim=GetTextBox(pText,0,0,0);
00061 
00062                         dim.X=0;
00063                         dim.Y=0;
00064                         dim.Width-=4;
00065                         dim.Height-=2;
00066 
00067                         return dim;
00068                 }
00069 
00070         //Stuff
00071 
00072         // RGB
00073         static WORD Color16bit(ColorStruct* pColor)     //Converts an RGB color to a 16bit color value.
00074                 { return (pColor->B >> 3) | ((pColor->G >> 2) << 5) | ((pColor->R >> 3) << 11); }
00075 
00076         static ColorStruct WordColor(WORD bits)
00077                 {
00078                         ColorStruct color;
00079                         color.R = ((bits & 0xF800) >> 11) << 3;
00080                         color.G = (BYTE)((bits & 0x07E0) >> 5) << 2; // msvc stupid warning
00081                         color.B = (bits & 0x001F) << 3;
00082                         return color;
00083                 }
00084 };
00085 
00086 //A few preset 16bit colors.
00087 #define         COLOR_BLACK             0x0000
00088 #define         COLOR_WHITE             0xFFFF
00089 
00090 #define         COLOR_RED               0xF800
00091 #define         COLOR_GREEN             0x07E0
00092 #define         COLOR_BLUE              0x001F
